tabs.community_hint: Double-tap to view the Community feed.

cannabis.age_gate_body: GrowBro offers educational cannabis guidance only. Confirm your age to continue.
cannabis.age_gate_disclaimer: GrowBro never provides shopping, ordering, pickup, or delivery features. Content remains educational only.
cannabis.age_gate_error_invalid: Enter a valid birth date to confirm your age.
cannabis.age_gate_error_underage: GrowBro is limited to adults 18 or older.
cannabis.age_gate_re_verification: For compliance, you'll be asked to re-verify your age every 12 months.
cannabis.age_gate_secondary_disclaimer: By continuing you confirm you are at least 18 years old and understand GrowBro avoids commerce functionality.
cannabis.educational_banner_body: GrowBro does not facilitate sales, vendor links, pickup, or delivery. All features remain educational and policy compliant.

community.empty_state: No posts yet. Be the first to share!
community.list_empty_body: We’ll show updates once they’re available.
community.list_error_body: Please check your connection and try again.
community.load_error: Failed to load posts. Tap to retry.

aiTraining.impact: Off: diagnosis still works; no images added to training pool. Basis: consent; Retention: 365d
aiTraining.subtitle: Allow using your images to improve models
aiTraining.title: AI training images

analytics.impact: Off: playbook improvement analytics disabled. Basis: consent; Retention: 180d aggregated
analytics.infoBody: Anonymous usage of guided grow playbooks helps us refine schedules and AI recommendations.
analytics.subtitle: Help improve playbooks & AI suggestions
analytics.title: Guided grow analytics

crashDiagnostics.impact: Off: no crash reports are sent. Basis: consent; Retention: 180d
crashDiagnostics.subtitle: Send minimized crash reports
crashDiagnostics.title: Crash diagnostics

crashReporting.impact: Off: no crash diagnostics sent. Basis: consent; Retention: 90d aggregated
crashReporting.infoBody: Sending crash diagnostics helps us fix stability issues faster. We strip identifiers where possible.
crashReporting.subtitle: Send minimized crash diagnostics
crashReporting.title: Crash reporting

experiments.impact: Off: no A/B tests; feature rollouts disabled for you. Basis: consent
experiments.subtitle: Enable A/B tests and flags after consent
experiments.title: Experiments / feature flags

optOutError.message: Something went wrong withdrawing consent. Please try again.
optOutError.title: Opt-out failed

consent.optOutSubtitle: You can withdraw previously granted consent choices here.

optOutSuccess.message: We've disabled analytics and telemetry going forward.
optOutSuccess.title: All consents withdrawn

personalized.impact: Off: reports stay fully anonymous. Basis: consent; Retention: 30d
personalized.infoBody: Allows attaching pseudonymous IDs to improve error traceability. No direct personal data is stored.
personalized.subtitle: Include hashed identifiers in reports
personalized.title: Personalized diagnostics

quickOptOut.description: Withdraw all optional data collection consents instantly. Mandatory technical data is not collected.
quickOptOut.title: Quick opt-out

sessionReplay.impact: Off: no interaction replays. Basis: consent; Retention: 30d
sessionReplay.infoBody: Replay helps diagnose complex UI issues. Sensitive fields are masked where possible.
sessionReplay.subtitle: Allow anonymized interaction capture
sessionReplay.title: Session replay

telemetry.impact: Off: no usage analytics; performance metrics remain local. Basis: consent; Retention: 90d aggregated
telemetry.infoBody: Telemetry helps us understand feature usage and performance so we can improve reliability. We minimize and aggregate data.
telemetry.subtitle: Allow usage analytics after consent
telemetry.title: Telemetry / analytics

consent.title: Privacy choices

home.share_update_subtitle: Let the community know how your plants are doing.

empty.body: There are no items to display.
empty.title: No items

error.body: We couldn't load the content. Please try again.
error.title: Something went wrong

moderation.authentication_required: Authentication required to perform this action
moderation.block_failed: Failed to block user. Please try again.
moderation.delete_failed: Failed to delete content. Please try again.
moderation.mute_failed: Failed to mute user. Please try again.
moderation.report_failed: Failed to report content. Please try again.

exactAlarm.title: Keep reminders on time

archived.toggle_hint: Toggles whether archived notifications are shown.

unread.body: We'll keep this updated as soon as something new arrives.
unread.title: No unread notifications

error.body: Check your connection and try again.
error.title: Couldn't load notifications

overdue.body_other: You have {{count}} overdue tasks. Catch up to keep your grow on track.
overdue.title: Tasks need attention

onboarding.notifications_body: Allow notifications to get timely task reminders.

analytics.body: Help us improve the app with usage analytics.
analytics.subtitle: Help us improve the app with usage analytics

privacy.cannotOpenUrlBody: Unable to open the web deletion page. Please check your internet connection or contact support.

crashReporting.body: Help us fix bugs by sending crash reports.
crashReporting.subtitle: Help us fix bugs by sending crash reports
crashReporting.title: Crash Reporting

privacy.deleteAccountConfirmBody: This schedules permanent deletion of your account and associated GrowBro data. You can export your data first if needed.
privacy.deleteAccountErrorBody: We could not queue the deletion. Details: {{message}}
privacy.deleteAccountQueuedBody: We queued your deletion request. Estimated completion: {{eta}}.
privacy.deleteAccountQueuedBodyNoEta: We queued your deletion request. You will receive a confirmation once completed.
privacy.exportErrorBody: We could not queue the export. Details: {{message}}
privacy.exportQueuedBody: We queued your data export. Estimated completion: {{eta}}.
privacy.exportQueuedBodyNoEta: We queued your data export. You will receive a link when it is ready.
privacy.invalidUrlBody: The web deletion URL is not secure. Please contact support.
privacy.manageDataDescription: Manage your GrowBro data export, account deletion, and policy disclosures.

personalized.body: This includes IP addresses, user IDs, and other identifying information that helps us provide better error reports and analytics. This data is handled according to our privacy policy.
personalized.subtitle: Include identifying information in reports
personalized.title: Personalized Data

sessionReplay.body: Session replay records your app interactions to help us debug issues. Sensitive data is filtered or redacted where possible; see Privacy Policy for details.
sessionReplay.subtitle: Record app interactions for debugging
sessionReplay.title: Session Replay

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.urlErrorBody: An error occurred while opening the web deletion page. Details: {{message}}
privacy.webDeletionHeading: Need to delete outside the app?
privacy.webDeletionPrompt: Use our web form ({{url}}) if you cannot access the mobile app.
privacy.webPortalAuthNote: Sign in so we can verify your identity before queuing deletion. You can sign out after submitting your request.
privacy.webPortalDeletionCopy: We will queue the deletion and send a confirmation when processing is complete. Deletion typically finishes within 30 days.
privacy.webPortalExportCopy: We prepare your data export and inform you once it’s ready.
privacy.webPortalIntro: Use this page to request account deletion or a data export if you cannot open the mobile app.

sync.reset_local_body: This permanently clears local database. Your cloud data remains intact.
sync.title: Sync

home.subtitle: Review tasks, signals, and quick actions.
home.title: Today in your garden
